Name: Jaywing plc
Description: With our heritage in data science we deliver exceptional results, creating brilliant work that’s impossible to ignore. Jaywing uniquely has in-depth capabilities in both Risk and Marketing. Our specialisms in Risk and Regulation include: Artificial Intelligence (AI); IFRS 9; advanced IRB; stress testing; fraud prevention; insurance; understanding business requirements and data management. Our specialisms in Marketing include: attribution & optimisation; personalisation & CRM; brand & creative; strategy & planning; analysis & insight; AI; content & social; advertising & campaigns; SEO/PCC/Programmatic; UX design; website & app builds; mobile & digital sales promotion; GDPR; data management; and PR & earned media
Additional Experience: Analytic Modernization, Customer Intelligence, Fraud (Security Intelligence), Risk Management
Industries: Financial Services, Insurance, Retail, Telecommunications, Energy and Utilities, Media and Entertainment

Name: Just in Time Technologies Pvt Ltd
Kafein Yazilim ve Bilgisayar Hizmetleri San Tic Ltd Sti
Description: Who Are We? «We are the trusted partner of organizations, providing them value-added turn-key solutions and guide them through their digital transformations while respecting the fact that every corporation has its character, spirit, values, and goals. We continue working to provide for society and humanity with tomorrow’s technologies.» Cem Kalyoncu General Manager, Kafein Technology Established in 2005, Kafein Technology has been providing to the technology software and management needs of national and global customers in telecom, banking, technology, tourism, services, insurance and retail sectors for more than ten years. In addition to turn-key solutions tailored to customer needs, Kafein Technology develops software in the fields of IoT, big data analysis, security, and mobile applications, and continuously work on R&D projects with its global partners and institutions. Kafein Technology continues to grow exponentially every year, undertaking e-commerce and telecommunications projects for Turkey's largest institutions and abroad. We are a highly skilled technology family with our subsidiary Smartiks, which produces effective business solutions using high-tech components and Intranet, which provides occupational health and safety software, and with KTEC developing financial technology solutions
Certifications: SAS Certified Predictive Modeler using Enterprise Miner 13

Name: KEINAVO S.r.l.
Description: Keinavo provides auditing, consultancy and training services on Big Data, Analytics and Business Intelligence, System Integration and Optimization, Data Management, Platform and Business Process Management. With offices in Italy and Switzerland, Keinavo supports clients in the EMEA region during the full project lifecycle, from requirements gathering to functional analysis, implementation and system maintenance. Keinavo is the perfect Partner for designing and managing tailored, lean and agile data platform architectures, helping you save time and resources. Collaborating with Keinavo means you can count on certified skills and strategic partnerships to carry out your projects.

Name: Kinaesis Ltd
Description:
We are the leading Financial Services consultants in the delivery of high performance data architectures, enterprise information management and high performance analytics and reporting. We help our customers tap into huge volumes of complex data, servicing the extreme analytics and reporting needs of many thousands of end users. We unlock value, delivering real-time insight and agile decision making.  

http://www.kinaesis.com/articles

Name: Klarrio
Description: Klarrio is a systems integration, consulting and software development firm, specializing in real-time data streaming. For organizations needing integration services that require cloud-native/open-source expertise, and a strategic bridge to emerging technologies, such as IoT, big data and AI, Klarrio is a trusted resource. Klarrio offers cloud-agnostic solutions to help you achieve cross-organizational impact, with a secure tenant environment and the ability to align disparate data sources to deliver results not attainable with conventional IT architectures—all while avoiding vendor-lock-in and future scalability constraints. Partnering with SAS extends these solutions further through full-lifecycle analytic management from exploration and development of models through deployment in streaming engines on edge and cloud.
Industries: Telecommunications, Health Care and Life Sciences, Energy and Utilities, Manufacturing, Public Sector/Government

Name: KMM Technologies, Inc.
Description:
Founded in 2003, KMM Technologies, Inc. (KMM) is an externally assessed ISO 9001:2008, SBA 8(a) certified, Woman Owned Small Disadvantaged Business with strong expertise in Content Management Systems; Mobile, Web Applications and Portals Development, Data Management and Analytics, Enterprise Resource Planning, ITSM, Systems Integration, Agile Methodology and Program Management. KMM's Data Management & Analytics practice provides leading-edge solutions by combining analytical expertise with deep industry knowledge and focusing on solutions to meet practical business issues. 

As a Partner and Value-Added reseller to SAS Institute, KMM specializes in implementing robust and scalable solutions based on SAS Software Tools:  Architecture and Platform Administration,  Enterprise Data Management - Big Data, Analytics and Visualization, Cybersecurity,  Customer Intelligence and Marketing Analytics,  Risk Management and Regulatory Compliance. Learn more at http://www.KMMtechnologies.com.
Diversity: Minority Disadvantaged Small Business, Woman Owned, Woman-Owned Small Business
Industries: Education, Financial Services, Public Sector/Government, Health Care and Life Sciences, Insurance, Media and Entertainment, Retail, Energy and Utilities
